description: What is this Sorcery? Is a collection of 10 Factions of Wizards from The Land of Catena that are at war for the throne. WITS is a story telling IP and TCG that is driven by the events of the real blockchain and crypto worlds. Web2 meets Web3 in this thrilling fictitious world of Wizardry.

attributes.value: A chance at a Single, Booster OR Jumbo Box. Randomly 1 of the 3 Based on Supply
